pageProduct.name: Poise Liners Extra Long 22
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

POISE® Liners Extra Long for bladder leakage provide thin, discreet light bladder leakage (LBL) protection for droplets when sneezing, coughing or laughing. More absorbent than leading period liners so you remain protected to feel feminine, confident and in control.

  • Extra length for protection and security. 30% longer than Poise Light Liners
  • Trusted and reliable LBL protection - 4 layer design quickly absorbs and locks away wetness into the super absorbent ABSORB-LOC core. 
  • Ultimate dryness and freshness - soft, quick dry cover keeps you dry and comfortable all day. Change as required. 
  • Helps eliminate odour for utmost discretion. 
  • All day comfort - designed to hold its shape all day without scrunching, bunching, twisting or curling. 
  • Fragrance Free with No Added Nasties* (*No added azo dyes, natural rubber latex, elemental chlorine or other chemicals restricted by Kimberly-Clark - see www.poise.com.au/noaddednasties for more information)
  • Individually wrapped - hygienic & discreet 
Poise Products have been voted by Australians as Reader's Digest Winner of Most Trusted Brand In Incontinence from 2017-2021.

Boxed Contents: 22 Liners

Size: 22 Pack

Fits: Extra long.

Directions

Please do not flush this product down the toilet.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

This packaging is recyclable in Australia through the REDcycle Program. To find your nearest drop off location, visit www.redcycle.net.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 4 PELD or LDPE
